name: Thunder Gunner
description:
Special Thanks to EV for providing a great soundtrack

Please use ShadowRippleGames@gmail.com to contact the developer or comment below

Controls

  • Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move ship
  • Spacebar to fire
  • 'p' to pause game

This is the exciting follow up to Thunder Runner. It's time to bring the battle back at the storm

Also, please check out ShadowRipple.com for updates and more!
